full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Due to the ongoing impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposals (RFP) for the procurement of adapters for pipe-to-tube connections.

**Contract Details:**

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01029424
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information:** Debbie Bergeron, [debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)
* **Delivery Location:** CFSD Montreal, Canada

**Procurement Requirements:**

* Item 1: Adapter, Straight, Pipe to Tube (GSIN: 4730, NSN: 20-004-8955)
	+ Quantity: 200 units
	+ Unit of Issue: EA (each)
	+ Delivery Date: No later than July 1st, 2023
* Bidders must indicate the brand name and model, or Part Number and NCAGE (National Codification of Governments and Associations), for Equivalent or Substitute Products offered

**Submission Instructions:**

* Electronic submission using the epost Connect service is strongly encouraged
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French
* Bidders must comply with the specified bid delivery procedures outlined in the Bid Solicitation document

**Important Notice:**

* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

**Documents:**

* Refer to the article attached to this notice for the complete Bid Solicitation document (in English)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/08/7fcc8a88396d8190ea9f5ca251214290/w8485-237496a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/08/7fcc8a88396d8190ea9f5ca251214290/w8485-237496a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)

**Language:**

* This tender announcement is available in both English and French; however, the language of submission is English.

Note: I have reorganized and condensed the content to better fit the requested 400-word limit. All important details, including the tender summary, procurement requirements, submission instructions, and important notices, have been included. The rewritten entry is now more professional
